In offering this website, HoneyInsured is required to comply with all applicable federal law, including the standards established under 45 C.F.R. 155.220(c) and (d) and standards established under 45 C.F.R. 155.260 to protect the privacy and security of personally identifiable information. This website may not display all data on Qualified Health Plans being offered in your state through the Health Insurance Marketplace website. To see all available data on Qualified Health Plan options in your state, go to Health Insurance Marketplace website at HealthCare.gov.
